tool.name: Scanpy FilterGenes
tool.description: based on counts and numbers of cells expressed
tool.command: ln -s '${input_obj_file}' input.h5 && PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 scanpy-filter-genes #if $parameters #for $p in $parameters #set $min = $p.min #set $max = $p.max #if $p.name.startswith('pct_') #set $min = float($min) / 100 #set $max = float($max) / 100 #end if --param 'g:$p.name' $min $max #end for #end if #if $categories #set cats = ' '.join(["--category 'g:{name}' '{negate}{values}'".format(**$c) for $c in $categories]) ${cats} #end if #if $subsets #set subs = ' '.join(["--subset 'g:{name}' '{subset}'".format(**$s) for $s in $subsets]) ${subs} #end if $force_recalc @INPUT_OPTS@ @OUTPUT_OPTS@ @EXPORT_MTX_OPTS@

repeat.name: parameters
repeat.title: Parameters to select genes to keep

param.name: name
param.label: Name of parameter to filter on

param.name: min
param.label: Min value
param.help: Genes with value below min will be discarded.

param.name: max
param.label: Max value
param.help: Genes with value above max will be discarded.

repeat.name: categories
repeat.title: Categories to select genes to keep (unless negate is checked)

param.name: name
param.label: Name of the categorical variable to filter on

param.name: negate
param.label: Apply as negative filter
param.help: If enabled, specified categories will be removed rather than retained.

repeat.name: subsets
repeat.title: Subsets to select genes to keep

param.name: name
param.label: Name of the categorical variable to filter on

param.name: subset
param.label: List of values to keep
param.help: A one-column headerless text file is required

param.name: force_recalc
param.label: Force recalculation of QC vars
param.help: If set, it will recalculate pcts and other existing QC vars, overwriting existing ones.
